html:
2026-0121
2026-02-10IRCCImmigration and Refugee Protection ActReappointment of a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office) and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office)Reappointment of Tsering Lhamo Sergong of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), effective March 11, 2026.N/A
subject: Reappointment of a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office) and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office)
precis: Reappointment of Tsering Lhamo Sergong of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years; and her designation as Assistant Deputy Chairperson of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), effective March 11, 2026.
